ComicInfo.Title: Gooffellas; Mad’s Celebrity Cause-of-Death Betting Odds; How Bill Clinton Will Stack Up Against the U.S. Presidents; Spot Your Parents!; The Lighter Side of...; A Mad Look at Christmas; A Mad Investigative Report: Doomsday Cults in America Today; The Dumbest People, Events and Things of 2001; Monroe and… the Fishing Trip; Mad's Parental Etiquette Guide for Kids’ Sporting Events; Technology Carols for the Holiday Season
ComicInfo.Summary:
A cynical look at justice, modern romance, counterintelligence, shopping, relationships, lawyers, weapons, support groups, therapy, dating, the office, priorities, and doctors.
Just what the title implies: a satirical look at the past year.
